Description: Floor fragment of East Greek pottery plate; flaring ring foot; underside and inside flat and grooved; slight part of wall preserved, probably base of sofa rim. White slip, glaze fired orange-brown. Band over groove on underside; foot glazed save for upper part outside; wall glazed as far as preserved; on inside, band of hasty looops and diagonals; band and glazed area to the centre. Repair or suspension hole.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GK.41)
